title: 如果我的世界变真实会怎么样？
author: 哈骑士
txt_content: 如：无限水变的不再无限。猜到的大佬下面集合

replies.author: 曦灬月
replies.txt_content: 五大建筑服一夜之间全部消失

replies.author: HINATALiuHeng
replies.txt_content: 电脑会带不动

replies.author: 专刀你
replies.txt_content: 方块不再悬浮

replies.author: hudie_
replies.txt_content: 无限 多好 我一通水活七天

replies.author: Mr_Snake
replies.txt_content: 电脑蓝屏

replies.author: CK_yuaa
replies.txt_content: 闻到香味

replies.author: fantastic60
replies.txt_content: 在mc里上网课

replies.author: 最亮的信标
replies.txt_content: 移除所有特性

replies.author: jin13684552451
replies.txt_content: 那会看到一大堆难看的管道（工业服）

replies.author: 智乃offical
replies.txt_content: 牛顿制作，必为精品

replies.author: Junlinwh
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: _皮蛋_
replies.txt_content: 也不会怎么样 也是用不完

replies.author: BTsqz
replies.txt_content: 不知道，只知道好像你的头像，不错氵

replies.author: liaoxu2003
replies.txt_content: 我不敢想

replies.author: 电竞逗比俊
replies.txt_content: 会失去灵魂的特性
显卡香气    树不能空手锤爆

replies.author: 幽月琉璃
replies.txt_content: 牛顿、爱因斯坦、法拉第等人的棺材板已经烂了修好也不是原来的样子

replies.author: xiao_晨
replies.txt_content: 细思极恐

replies.author: KK5596
replies.txt_content: 我的世界开外挂  然后真实  成神？

replies.author: 小沫呀
replies.txt_content: 你会发现不存在什么海上建筑了，估计没几个月就被海水腐蚀塌了

replies.author: __WaackinG__
replies.txt_content: 那牛顿的棺材板终于可以盖上了

replies.author: 索菲缇娅
replies.txt_content: 瞬间索然无味
